message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $12,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for this product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product.
